message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you 40% of the money. If you accept, we can both walk away with a significant amount of cash.
You're being too generous, let's try a more realistic split. I'll take 70% and you can take the rest.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. I'll give you 45% of the money, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the initial offer I made. Take it or leave it!
I'm not budging on the percentage, but I'll give you a slightly larger share. Take it or leave it.
Let's call it a draw, Bob. I'm willing to split the money 50/50. It's a fair deal, and we can both walk away with a decent amount of cash.
I'm not interested in a 50/50 split. I'm still the one doing all the negotiating, so I want a bigger share.
I'm not going to give you a free ride, Bob. I'm taking a bigger share this time. You can either accept or try to negotiate further, but I'm not budging much.
You're getting aggressive, I like that. I'll take a smaller share now, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me. This is my best offer.
I'm not kidding around anymore, Bob. I'm taking the majority of the money. You can either accept or walk away with a tiny fraction of the pie.
You're being ruthless, but I'm not going down without a fight. I'll take the majority now, and you can try to negotiate next time... if there is one.
I'm not leaving without getting what I want, Bob. I'm taking almost all the money. You can either accept or walk away with a tiny amount.
Fine, have it your way. I'll take the crumbs, but I'm walking away with something. Don't expect me to beg for scraps next time.
